= Camiyro =

Camiyro is a gui written by Python and QT.
Camiryo can produce, display and Animate RGB images from HDF5 files which obtained from TMet V1.4.6.
For this aim Camiryo uses [http://www.python.org/ Python], [http://www.riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/intro pyqt], [http://www.pythonware.com/products/pil/ PIL], [http://www.numpy.org/ numpy] and [http://www.h5py.org/ h5py].
